name: CreateDatasetItem
description:
Create a new dataset item in a specified project.

Use this tool to add a new dataset item to a specific project within Datadog. Call this when you need to insert data into a project's dataset.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID for the target project. Obtain by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: new_dataset_item
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the new dataset item, including id, dataset name, inputs, outputs, metadata, and more.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
